query.name: com.classchoice.school.sections
query.description: Gets sections in the proper format for class choice.
query.sql: SELECT s.section_number, s.schoolid, s.expression, s.termid, s.maxenrollment, c.course_name, c.course_number, t.id, t.first_name, t.middle_name, t.last_name FROM sections s LEFT JOIN courses c ON c.course_number = s.course_number LEFT JOIN teachers t ON s.teacher = t.id WHERE s.schoolid in (615, 616) ORDER BY s.section_number, s.termid
